bio: Brad Balfour is Co-Founder of web startups MemorableMontages.com and Bscopes.com. Software Developer / Photography / Video University of Maryland Co-Founder of Memorable Montages, a website providing photo and video slideshows/montages with a special, emotional, memorable kick Co-Founder of Bscopes, a Web 2.0 startup working on information overload and helping folks find the blogs and websites they want to keep up with.  Also an amateur photographer and avid movie fan. Movie quote trivia a specialty. Software Engineer
